description: Beta 2.0.3 - Advanced Features: Blockchain Anchoring, NFT Certificates, Enhanced Governance

tasks.description: Implement blockchain anchoring for immutable proof
tasks.details: Implemented MerkleTree utility for cryptographic batching and BlockchainAnchoringService for syncing ledger entries to the chain. Added API endpoint to trigger batch anchoring and integrated it into the Ledger Dashboard. Currently using simulated blockchain hashes for Polygon network proof.

Automatically mint NFT for each registered content. Store certificate metadata on IPFS. Transfer NFT to artist's wallet. Enables digital ownership verification and potential secondary market functionality.

tasks.description: Implement rate limiting on verification API
tasks.details: Implemented sliding window RateLimiter middleware. Applied 100 requests/hour per IP limit to /api/v1/legal/verify endpoint. Uses file-based storage for high performance and persistence across restarts.

tasks.description: Create admin dashboard for ledger management
tasks.details: Built comprehensive Content Ownership Ledger dashboard in Admin v2. Supports filtering by source, owner tracking, real-time status (Local vs Anchored), and manual anchoring triggers. Direct links to printable certificates and Polygonscan (placeholder).

tasks.description: Export ledger data to various formats
tasks.details: Support CSV, JSON, PDF exports of ledger entries. Useful for label/distributor reports. Include filtering and date range options. Audit trail for all exports.
Allow users to dispute content ownership. Multi-step verification process. Evidence submission and review. Multi-signature approval for status changes. Audit log of all disputes.
Support collaborative works with multiple rights holders. Percentage-based split validation (must sum to 100%). Multi-party signing for rights agreements. Royalty split calculations and tracking.

tasks.description: Create mobile app with QR scanner
tasks.details: iOS/Android app for verifying certificates. QR code scanner integration. Display verification results inline. Push notifications for verification activity. Offline certificate viewing.
Chrome/Firefox extension that auto-verifies content while browsing. Hover-over verification tooltips. One-click verification for embedded media. Settings for automatic checks.
Send webhook notifications when content is registered. Allow third-party systems to subscribe to verification events. Support for custom integrations with distribution platforms.
Real-time statistics on content registrations, verifications, verification sources, artist activity, top verified content. Trend analysis and forecasting. Export analytics to reports.
Profile database queries. Add caching layer for frequently accessed entries. Consider pagination for large result sets. Monitor query execution times. Index optimization.

blockchain_integration_plan.contract_type: Custom smart contract for content ledger anchoring
key_functions: anchor(bytes32 merkle_root) - Submit ledger root hash
verify(bytes32 content_hash) - Check if hash exists in anchored root
getTimestamp(bytes32 content_hash) - Get blockchain verification date
